comments.body: Could you actually point out if these imports will work at runtime? [I don't see an `index.js` that would correspond to this.](https://unpkg.com/muicss@0.9.36/lib/react/)

Yes, they work at runtime.

They resolve to the `react.js` file in root, not a directory's `index.js` file.

https://unpkg.com/muicss@0.9.36/

I'm using these types in my application now.
